Name: Wave Shooter
About the game: The same level is diffrent! An endless casual shooter game. You choose the starting level! Replay-able The levels and the objective are randomized, so you will get a uniqe play session each time you play. you may choose the starting level, however you start with nothing! It is up to you to decide, are you going back to collect weapons at previous levels or you go and continue to push with the bare minimum. Enemies do scale with level. NOTE: First few levels are tutorial, so they got fix objective and challange. Player Loses all Gems they are holding this round on death. Uniqe Weapons Use your weapons to pass each mission and challenge. Gameplay Choose a level (Up to the last level you successfully arrived) Start the round with nothing but normal gun and few bombs Read the level objective at the top of the screen and the challnge line under it Go to the level exit that will spawn after the objective have been achived The more you preform in the game the higher your score will get. Will you re play from level 1 or keep pushing forword? Highscores can be views in the main menu
